title: Freedom's Echo
description: Hailey is afraid of horses. Her best friend Elaine has one, and Hailey will do anything to hide her fear. But when Hailey meets Freedom, Jani's foal with a mysterious former life, Hailey sees a way of overcoming that fear. Then an incident occurs that has half the town searching for Hailey - with little Freedom leading the way. The problem is, Freedom has to overcome her own fears - the ones connected to an old mystery and a scary man with a sad history that now includes Hailey - in order to help the girl!
author: Angela Dorsey
